channel.title: Help me!
channel.description:
ok i didnt do anything to my server it just sais "no response from server try using a different worl" all of the sudden i no its no working for others because i cant get through on my other computer eaither. beside from saying "no response from server try using a different world" sometimes you click login, and it just goes to a black screen with all the spirtes loaded but a black screen. no one can login to the server, im using a custom client, ive tried
> restarting server > checking all my recently edited files > re-extracting the server source!!(was working fine originally) > reextracting the client from the zip files
absolutely nothing is working please help me.
i just looked at my run.bat and its giving me this error
[code=java]exception in thread "main" java.lang.arrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 17 at ItemHandler.loadItemList(itemHandler.java:281) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:173) at server.main(server.java:113)[/code]
i already checked itemhandler this is the line of code its referring to
[code=java]loadItemList("item.cfg");[/code]
any help would be appreciated ty.

item.title: Help me!
item.dc:creator: @bobbykinney000 bobbykinney000
item.description:
@bobbykinney000 wrote:

ok i didnt do anything to my server it just sais “no response from server try using a different worl” all of the sudden i no its no working for others because i cant get through on my other computer eaither. beside from saying “no response from server try using a different world” sometimes you click login, and it just goes to a black screen with all the spirtes loaded but a black screen. no one can login to the server, im using a custom client, ive tried

restarting server
checking all my recently edited files
re-extracting the server source!!(was working fine originally)
reextracting the client from the zip files

absolutely nothing is working please help me.

i just looked at my run.bat and its giving me this error

exception in thread "main" java.lang.arrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 17 at ItemHandler.loadItemList(itemHandler.java:281) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:173) at server.main(server.java:113)

i already checked itemhandler this is the line of code its referring to

loadItemList("item.cfg");

any help would be appreciated ty.
